description:
emacs: add a "godoc" command, like M-x man

This runs godoc and displays its output in a new buffer.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=31329f71f8e7 ***

emacs: add a "godoc" command, like M-x man

This runs godoc and displays its output in a new buffer.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5268041

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>

subject: code review 5268041: emacs: add a "godoc" command, like M-x man
